scripts.build-main: mkdir -p dist && touch dist/index.js && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/index.js > dist/index.js
scripts.build-lib: mkdir -p dist/lib && touch dist/lib/utils.js && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/lib/utils.js > dist/lib/utils.js
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npm run build-main && npm run build-lib
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npm run build-main && npm run build-lib
